overview: Students undertaking the thesis should demonstrate a critical application of specialist knowledge and make an independent contribution to existing scholarship in their area of research.
ilo: Developed the capacity to undertake a substantial research project
Developed skills in the critical application of specialist knowledge in their study area
Developed the capacity to produce an argument and muster evidence in the writing of a substantial research project.
generic_skills: demonstrate advanced learning in research skills;
demonstrate critical application of specialist knowledge in their area of study;
carry out an independent piece of research.

Inherent requirements (core participatio.content: Further details on how to seek academic adjustments can be found on the Student Equity and Disability Support website:http://services.unimelb.edu.au/student-equity/home

assessment.brief: A thesis on an approved topic.
